description: High-grade uterine serous carcinoma demonstrates invasion to the uterine serosa with a metastatic nodule, no lymph node involvement (pT3a N0 MX, FIGO IIIA).
patient_notes: Your pathology shows a high-grade uterine cancer that has reached the outer lining of the uterus but has not spread to lymph nodes. We recommend a combination of chemotherapy and pelvic radiation, which may include internal vaginal radiation, to reduce the risk of the cancer returning.

verification.assessment: The staging is accurate with pT3a N0 MX corresponding to FIGO stage IIIA given serosal and peritoneal involvement without nodal metastasis.
